name: HentaiMineSweeper
description:
HentaiMineSweeper is a strategy game. What you need to do is to sweep away the minefield in front of you and show the pictures hidden under the minefield to win and reward. Don't worry about its difficulty. If you get stuck in a certain level, you can call the support with one click and instantly clean up all the mines on the field.

Operational gameplay
Victory conditions: You need to mark all the thunders without a wrong thunder. If you make a mistake, you have to start again, so this game also has a certain luck component.
How to operate: Left click to open this grid, right click to mark the mine, left and right button together to see the clickable range of this number, you point out a number, is 1, it means that there are 1 in the 8 grid around it Lei, there are two mines in 2, there are three mines in 3, and so on. If you sweep the lightning around the number and there are still spaces, you don't have to open it one by one. Just press the left and right buttons of the mouse and press it at the same time. But if you mark the wrong mine, then restart the level.

Battlefield function key
Keyboard P: One-click mine sweeping
Keyboard S: Emergency avoidance (background image turns white, you can continue to mine)

Game features
Pleasing picture
Impassioned music
